text: Shadyback Dealer: Pss, hey kid! Wanna buy supreme quality backpack?
Shadyback Dealer: I've got one just in your size. Solid. Only for $50 000. Deal? Deal? Deal?
Shadyback Dealer: What do you mean you have no money? Hey! that is nice cat... come you little bar of fur.
The dealer is distracted by the cat. Now is your chance to steal the backpack
